title: Release + Tonic
description: Generate high-quality synthetic data for your development and preview environments.
betterDescription: Release and Tonic partner to help organizations maintain data privacy while enabling developers to work with realistic data in their environments.
betterCards:
Synthetic Data Generation

Automatically generate and refresh synthetic data in your Release environments, maintaining data privacy while preserving data relationships and characteristics.

Privacy by Design

Ensure compliance and protect sensitive information while giving developers access to realistic data for testing and development.

Production-like Data

Work with data that maintains the same statistical properties and relationships as production data, ensuring reliable testing and development.
